original_text: And that is just what I did in Jerusalem. On the authority of the chief priests I put many of the Lord’s people in prison, and when they were put to death, I cast my vote against them.
korean_text: 예루살렘에서 이런 일을 행하여 대제사장들에게서 권한을 받아 가지고 많은 성도를 옥에 가두며 또 죽일 때에 내가 찬성 투표를 하였고

sentences.original_text: And that is just what I did in Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 내가 예루살렘에서 한 일입니다.

sentences.original_text: On the authority of the chief priests
I put many of the Lord's people in prison
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 주의 백성 많은 사람들을 감옥에 넣었고

sentences.original_text: and when they were put to death
I cast my vote against them.
